identity.title: (Exception) Getting price from array of products

content.prompt: Complete the method getProductPrice(Product[] arr, int index) in order to get the price of the product in the position index of the array arr. You need to be aware of two erroneous situations that could happen in this context, where you need to implement try/catch to handle this situations:1. If the product in the position index is null, the method needs to return 0.0;2. If the index provided is "out of bounds" of the array arr, the method needs to return -9999.0;
